The Council Hills were a clump of hills in the Eastern Shaar
The hills were home to the long-destroyed city of Shandaular and have since been mere ruins. Beneath the hills were remains of the old city, a series of underground tunnels. The tribesmen of the Shaar used the more superficial tunnels and passageways as tombs to honor their dead, respecting the sanctity of undisturbed crypts.
